snippet: The Food and Drug Administration expanded approval of a Pfizer drug to treat a small subset of lung cancer patients with a rare mutation.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration expands approval of Pfizer's Xalkori capsules, which treat small subset of lung cancer patients with rare gene mutation.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration expanded approval of a Pfizer drug to treat a small subset of lung cancer patients with a rare mutation.

headline.main: F.D.A. Approves Drug for More Lung Cancer Patients
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves Drug for More Lung Cancer Patients
